text: He mominaharu! Svayam aphula'i ra aphna gharavalaharula'i tyasa agobata baca'u, jasako indhana munasya ra pat'thara hunechan, jasako lagi kathora svabhavaka, yasta balasali pharistaharu niyukta hunechan jasale tyasama allahako avajna gardainan baru je adesa pani di'incha, tyasala'i karyanvita gardachan
